impact() - Method in class controller.BrickController
impact Method is responsible to set the broken variable based on the brick's status.

impact is an Overrides the Method in the parent class, BrickController class.

impactBorder is a Private Method that carries out the implementation for when the ball makes impact with game border.

impactWall is a Private Method that is responsible for when the ball makes impact with the wall.

initialize is a Private Method to initialize the Debug Panel.

initialize is a Method to initialize the in-game frame.

initialize() - Method in class view.GameBoardView
initialize is a Private Method to initialize the in-game screen.

inMiddle is a Private Method responsible for checking if in the middle of the brick.

InstructionBoardView is responsible for displaying the Instructions Screen.

isBallLost() - Method in class controller.WallController
Getter method for finding if ball lost or not.
isBallLost() - Method in class controller.WallControllerTest
 
isBroken() - Method in class controller.BrickController
isBroken Method is responsible for returning if the brick is broken or not.
